5 
6  std::complex<double> ViewUtil::DelayIntegrate(SeqViewComplex& data, double tau, double f1, double f2) {
7  Cmatrix* d = data.GetData();
8  double scale = data.GetScale();
9  std::complex<double> sum = 0.0;
10  unsigned int i1 = (f1 - data.GetStart()) / data.GetSampling();
11  unsigned int i2 = (f2 - data.GetStart()) / data.GetSampling();
12  for (unsigned int i = i1; i <= i2; i++) {
13  std::complex<double> ex = std::exp(std::complex<double>(0.0, 2.0 * M_PI * i * data.GetSampling() * tau));
14  sum += (*d)(0, i) * ex;
15  }
16  sum *= scale * data.GetSampling();
17  return sum;
18  }
19 
20  std::complex<double> ViewUtil::DelayIntegrate(SeqViewDouble& data, double tau, double f1, double f2) {
21  Dmatrix* d = data.GetData();
22  double scale = data.GetScale();
23  std::complex<double> sum = 0.0;
24  unsigned int i1 = (f1 - data.GetStart()) / data.GetSampling();
25  unsigned int i2 = (f2 - data.GetStart()) / data.GetSampling();
26  for (unsigned int i = i1; i <= i2; i++) {
27  std::complex<double> ex = std::exp(std::complex<double>(0.0, 2.0 * M_PI * i * data.GetSampling() * tau));
28  sum += (*d)(0, i) * ex;
29  }
30  sum *= scale * data.GetSampling();
31  return sum;
32  }

34  std::complex<double> ViewUtil::Integrate(SeqViewComplex& data, double f1, double f2) {

37  std::complex<double> sum = 0.0;

41  sum += (*d)(0, i);

47  double ViewUtil::Integrate(SeqViewDouble& data, double f1, double f2) {
48  Dmatrix* d = data.GetData();
49  double scale = data.GetScale();
50  double sum = 0.0;
51  unsigned int i1 = (f1 - data.GetStart()) / data.GetSampling();
52  unsigned int i2 = (f2 - data.GetStart()) / data.GetSampling();
53  for (unsigned int i = i1; i <= i2; i++) {
54  sum += (*d)(0, i);
55  }
56  sum *= scale * data.GetSampling();
57  return sum;
58  }

60  void ViewUtil::Print(SeqViewDouble& s1, char * filename) {
61  unsigned int channels = s1.GetChannels();
62  unsigned int len = s1.GetSize();
63 
64  std::ofstream out(filename);
65 
66  out << std::setiosflags(std::ios::scientific) << std::setprecision(20);
67 
68  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
69 
70  out << s1.GetX(i) << " ";
71 
72  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < channels; j++) {
73 
74  out << s1(j, i) << " ";
75 
76  }
77 
78  out << "\n";
79 
80  }
81 
82  }

129  void ViewUtil::Range(SeqViewDouble& s1, int l, int m) {
130  Dmatrix* data = s1.GetData();
131 
132  if (l < 0) {
133  l = data->size2() + l;
134  if (l < 0) {
135  LogSevere("Bad index");
136  throw std::runtime_error("ViewUtil::Range - Bad index");
137  }
138  }
139  if (m < 0) {
140  m = data->size2() + m;
141  if (m < 0) {
142  LogSevere("Bad index");
143  throw std::runtime_error("ViewUtil::Range - Bad index");
144  }
145  }
146  if (((unsigned int) l >= data->size2()) || ((unsigned int) m >= data->size2())) {
147  LogSevere("Bad index");
148  throw std::runtime_error("ViewUtil::Range - Bad index");
149  }
150 
151 
152  unsigned int ch = data->size1();
153  unsigned int nsz = (l > m) ? l - m + 1 : m - l + 1;
154  unsigned int mn = (l > m) ? m : l;
155 
156  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < ch; i++) {
157  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < nsz; j++) {
158  (*data)(i, j) = (*data)(i, j + mn);
159  }
160  }
161 
162  data->resize(data->size1(), nsz);
163  s1.SetStart(s1.GetStart() + mn * s1.GetSampling());
164  }
165

202  void ViewUtil::Range(SeqViewDouble& s1, SeqViewDouble& s2, int l, int m) {
203  Dmatrix* data = s1.GetData();
204  Dmatrix* res = s2.GetData();
205  if (l < 0) {
206  l = data->size2() + l;
207  if (l < 0) {
208  LogSevere("Bad index");
209  throw std::runtime_error("ViewUtil::Range - Bad index");
210  }
211  }
212  if (m < 0) {
213  m = data->size2() + m;
214  if (m < 0) {
215  LogSevere("Bad index");
216  throw std::runtime_error("ViewUtil::Range - Bad index");
217  }
218  }
219  if (((unsigned int) l >= data->size2()) || ((unsigned int) m >= data->size2())) {
220  LogSevere("Bad index");
221  throw std::runtime_error("ViewUtil::Range - Bad index");
222  }
223 
224 
225  //unsigned int sz = data->size2();
226  unsigned int ch = data->size1();
227  unsigned int nsz = (l > m) ? l - m + 1 : m - l + 1;
228  unsigned int mn = (l > m) ? m : l;
229 
230  if ((res->size1() != data->size1()) || (res->size2() != nsz)) {
231  LogWarning("ViewUtil::Range - resizing output view");
232  res->resize(data->size1(), nsz);
233  }
234 
235  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < ch; i++) {
236  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < nsz; j++) {
237  (*res)(i, j) = (*data)(i, j + mn);
238  }
239  }
240  s2.SetStart(s1.GetStart() + mn * s1.GetSampling());
241  s2.SetSampling(s1.GetSampling());
242  s2.SetScale(s1.GetScale());
243 
244  }

246  void ViewUtil::Join(std::vector<SeqViewComplex>& sl, SeqViewComplex& joined, double start, double sampling, unsigned int length) {
247  unsigned int totsize = 0;
248  for (std::vector<SeqViewComplex>::iterator pc = sl.begin(); pc != sl.end(); pc++) {
249  totsize += pc->GetChannels();
250  }
251 
252  Cmatrix* datar = joined.GetData();
253  if ((datar->size1() != totsize) || (datar->size2() != length)) {
254  LogWarning("Join: resizing output view: %d %d", totsize, length);
255  datar->resize(totsize, length);
256  }
257  joined.SetScale(1.0);
258  joined.SetStart(start);
259  joined.SetSampling(sampling);
260 
261  unsigned int row = 0;
262  for (std::vector<SeqViewComplex>::iterator pc = sl.begin(); pc != sl.end(); pc++) {
263  double scale = pc->GetScale();
264  Cmatrix* datas = pc->GetData();
265 
266  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < datas->size1(); i++) {
267 
268  if (datas->size2() >= length) {
269  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < length; j++) {
270  (*datar)(row, j) = scale * (*datas)(i, j);
271  }
272  } else {
273  unsigned int j;
274  for (j = 0; j < datas->size2(); j++) {
275  (*datar)(row, j) = scale * (*datas)(i, j);
276  }
277  for (; j < length; j++) {
278  (*datar)(row, j) = std::complex<double>(1.0, 0.0);
279  }
280  }
281  row++;
282 
283  }
284  }
285  }
286 
287  void ViewUtil::Join(std::vector<SeqViewDouble>& sl, SeqViewDouble& joined, double start, double sampling, unsigned int length) {
288  unsigned int totsize = 0;
289  for (std::vector<SeqViewDouble>::iterator pc = sl.begin(); pc != sl.end(); pc++) {
290  totsize += pc->GetChannels();
291  }
292 
293  Dmatrix* datar = joined.GetData();
294  if ((datar->size1() != totsize) || (datar->size2() != length)) {
295  LogWarning("Join: resizing output view");
296  datar->resize(totsize, length);
297  }
298  joined.SetScale(1.0);
299  joined.SetStart(start);
300  joined.SetSampling(sampling);
301 
302  unsigned int row = 0;
303  for (std::vector<SeqViewDouble>::iterator pc = sl.begin(); pc != sl.end(); pc++) {
304 
305  double scale = pc->GetScale();
306 
307  Dmatrix* datas = pc->GetData();
308 
309  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < datas->size1(); i++) {
310  if (datas->size2() >= length) {
311  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < length; j++) {
312  (*datar)(row, j) = scale * (*datas)(i, j);
313  }
314  } else {
315  unsigned int j;
316  for (j = 0; j < datas->size2(); j++) {
317  (*datar)(row, j) = scale * (*datas)(i, j);
318  }
319  for (; j < length; j++) {
320  (*datar)(row, j) = 0.0;
321  }
322  }
323  row++;
324  }
325  }
326  }
327 
328  void ViewUtil::Join(SeqViewDouble& s1, SeqViewDouble& s2, SeqViewDouble& joined) {
329  Dmatrix* data1 = s1.GetData();
330  Dmatrix* data2 = s2.GetData();
331  Dmatrix* datar = joined.GetData();
332 
333  double scale1 = s1.GetScale();
334  double scale2 = s2.GetScale();
335 
336 
337  if (data1->size2() != data2->size2()) {
338  LogSevere("Views of different length");
339  throw std::runtime_error("ViewUtil::Join");
340  }
341 
342  Dmatrix tmp(data1->size1() + data2->size1(), data1->size2());
343 
344  unsigned int sz1 = data1->size1();
345  unsigned int sz2 = data1->size2();
346 
347  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < sz1; i++) {
348  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < sz2; j++) {
349  tmp(i, j) = scale1 * (*data1)(i, j);
350  }
351  }
352 
353  unsigned int bottom = sz1;
354  sz1 = data2->size1();
355  sz2 = data2->size2();
356 
357  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < sz1; i++) {
358  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < sz2; j++) {
359  tmp(i + bottom, j) = scale2 * (*data2)(i, j);
360  }
361  }
362 
363  *datar = tmp;
364 
365  joined.SetScale(1.0);
366  joined.SetStart(s1.GetStart());
367  joined.SetSampling(s1.GetSampling());
368 
369  if (s1.GetStart() != s2.GetStart()) {
370  LogWarning("Views with different starting times: %g %g (forced to %g)",
371  s1.GetStart(),
372  s2.GetStart(),
373  s1.GetStart());
374  }
375 
376 
377  if (s1.GetSampling() != s2.GetSampling()) {
378  LogWarning("Views with different sampling times: %g %g (forced to %g)",
379  s1.GetSampling(),
380  s2.GetSampling(),
381  s1.GetSampling());
382  }
383  }
384 
385  void ViewUtil::Append(SeqViewDouble& s1, SeqViewDouble& s2) {
386  Dmatrix* data1 = s1.GetData();
387  Dmatrix* data2 = s2.GetData();
388 
389  double scale1 = s1.GetScale();
390  double scale2 = s2.GetScale();
391 
392 
393  if (data1->size2() != data2->size2()) {
394  LogSevere("Views of different length");
395  throw std::runtime_error("ViewUtil::Append");
396  }
397 
398  data1->resize(data1->size1() + data2->size1(), data1->size2(), true);
399 
400 
401  unsigned int bottom = data1->size1();
402  unsigned int sz1 = data2->size1();
403  unsigned int sz2 = data2->size2();
404 
405  double ratio = scale2 / scale1;
406 
407  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < sz1; i++) {
408  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < sz2; j++) {
409  (*data1)(i + bottom, j) = ratio * (*data2)(i, j);
410  }
411  }
412 
413  if (s1.GetStart() != s2.GetStart()) {
414  LogWarning("Views with different starting times: %g %g (forced to %g)",
415  s1.GetStart(),
416  s2.GetStart(),
417  s1.GetStart());
418  }
419 
420 
421  if (s1.GetSampling() != s2.GetSampling()) {
422  LogWarning("Views with different sampling times: %g %g (forced to %g)",
423  s1.GetSampling(),
424  s2.GetSampling(),
425  s1.GetSampling());
426  }
427 
428 
429  }
430 
431  void ViewUtil::LeftShift(SeqViewDouble& seq, SeqViewDouble& ins) {
432  Dmatrix* data1 = seq.GetData();
433  Dmatrix* data2 = ins.GetData();
434  double scale1 = seq.GetScale();
435  double scale2 = ins.GetScale();
436 
437  if (data1->size1() != data2->size1()) {
438  LogSevere("Views with different channels");
439  throw std::runtime_error("ViewUtil::LeftShift - Views with different channels");
440  }
441 
442  unsigned int channels = data1->size1();
443  unsigned int sz = data1->size2();
444  unsigned int ins_sz = data2->size2();
445 
446  if (sz >= ins_sz) {
447  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < channels; i++) {
448  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < sz - ins_sz; j++) {
449  (*data1)(i, j) = scale1 * (*data1)(i, j + ins_sz);
450  }
451  for (unsigned int j = sz - ins_sz; j < sz; j++) {
452  (*data1)(i, j) = scale2 * (*data2)(i, j - sz + ins_sz);
453  }
454  }
455  seq.SetStart(seq.GetStart() + ins_sz * seq.GetSampling());
456  seq.SetScale(1.0);
457  } else {
458  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < channels; i++) {
459  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < sz; j++) {
460  (*data1)(i, j) = scale2 * (*data2)(i, j + ins_sz - sz);
461  }
462  }
463  seq.SetStart(seq.GetStart() + sz * seq.GetSampling());
464  seq.SetScale(1.0);
465  }
466  }
467 
468  void ViewUtil::PadLeft(SeqViewDouble& src, SeqViewDouble& dst, unsigned int size, double value) {
469  Dmatrix* datas = src.GetData();
470  Dmatrix* datad = dst.GetData();
471 
472  if ((datas->size1() != datad->size1()) || (datas->size2() + size != datad->size2())) {
473  LogWarning("PadLeft: resizing output view");
474  datad->resize(datas->size1(), datas->size2() + size);
475  }
476 
477  double v = value / src.GetScale();
478 
479 
480  for (unsigned int c = 0; c < datas->size1(); c++) {
481 
482  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < datas->size2(); i++) {
483  (*datad)(c, i) = (*datas)(c, i);
484  }
485  for (unsigned int i = datas->size2(); i < datas->size2() + size; i++) {
486  (*datad)(c, i) = v;
487  }
488  }
489 
490  dst.SetScale(src.GetScale());
491  dst.SetStart(src.GetStart());
492  dst.SetSampling(src.GetSampling());
493 
494  }
495 
496  void ViewUtil::PadRight(SeqViewDouble& src, SeqViewDouble& dst, unsigned int size, double value) {
497 
498  Dmatrix* datas = src.GetData();
499  Dmatrix* datad = dst.GetData();
500 
501  if ((datas->size1() != datad->size1()) || (datas->size2() + size != datad->size2())) {
502  LogWarning("PadRight: resizing output view");
503  datad->resize(datas->size1(), datas->size2() + size);
504  }
505 
506  double v = value / src.GetScale();
507 
508 
509  for (unsigned int c = 0; c < datas->size1(); c++) {
510 
511  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
512  (*datad)(c, i) = v;
513  }
514  for (unsigned int i = size; i < datas->size2() + size; i++) {
515  (*datad)(c, i) = (*datas)(c, i - size);
516  }
517  }
518 
519  dst.SetScale(src.GetScale());
520  dst.SetStart(src.GetStart());
521  dst.SetSampling(src.GetSampling());
522 
523  }
524 
525  double ViewUtil::Dot(SeqViewDouble& s1, unsigned int ch1, SeqViewDouble& s2, unsigned int ch2) {
526  Dmatrix* data1 = s1.GetData();
527  Dmatrix* data2 = s2.GetData();
528 
529  if ((data1->size1() <= ch1) || (data2->size1() <= ch2) || (data1->size2() != data2->size2())) {
530  LogSevere("Dot: wrong parameters");
531  throw std::runtime_error("Dot: wrong parameters");
532  }
533  double scale1 = s1.GetScale();
534  double scale2 = s2.GetScale();
535 
536  double dot = 0.0;
537  unsigned int sz = data1->size2();
538  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < sz; i++) {
539 
540  dot += (*data1)(ch1, i)*(*data2)(ch2, i);
541 
542  }
543 
544  return scale1 * scale2*dot;
545 
546  }
547 
548  void ViewUtil::SumChannels(SeqViewDouble& s1, SeqViewDouble& sum) {
549  Dmatrix* src = s1.GetData();
550  Dmatrix* dst = sum.GetData();
551 
552  if ((src->size2() != dst->size2()) || (dst->size1() != 1)) {
553  LogWarning("SumChannels: resizing output view");
554  dst->resize(1, src->size2());
555  }
556 
557  unsigned int sz1 = src->size1();
558  unsigned int sz2 = src->size2();
559 
560  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < sz2; i++) {
561  (*dst)(0, i) = (*src)(0, i);
562  for (unsigned int j = 1; j < sz1; j++) {
563  (*dst)(0, i) += (*src)(j, i);
564  }
565  }
566  sum.SetScale(s1.GetScale());
567  sum.SetStart(s1.GetStart());
568  sum.SetSampling(s1.GetSampling());
569  }
570 
571  void ViewUtil::SumChannels(SeqViewDouble& s1, SeqViewDouble& sum, double wfirst, double wothers) {
572  Dmatrix* src = s1.GetData();
573  Dmatrix* dst = sum.GetData();
574 
575  if ((src->size2() != dst->size2()) || (dst->size1() != 1)) {
576  LogWarning("SumChannels: resizing output view");
577  dst->resize(1, src->size2());
578  }
579 
580  unsigned int sz1 = src->size1();
581  unsigned int sz2 = src->size2();
582 
583  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < sz2; i++) {
584  (*dst)(0, i) = wfirst * (*src)(0, i);
585  for (unsigned int j = 1; j < sz1; j++) {
586  (*dst)(0, i) += wothers * (*src)(j, i);
587  }
588  }
589  sum.SetScale(s1.GetScale());
590  sum.SetStart(s1.GetStart());
591  sum.SetSampling(s1.GetSampling());
592  }
593 
594  bool ViewUtil::PeekRange(SeqViewDouble& src, SeqViewDouble& dst, double tstart, double tend) {
595  Dmatrix* dsrc = src.GetData();
596  Dmatrix* ddst = dst.GetData();
597  double t1 = src.GetStart();
598  double t2 = src.GetEnd();
599 
600  if (tstart > tend) {
601  LogSevere("ViewUtil::PeekRange - tsart>tend");
602  throw std::runtime_error("ViewUtil::PeekRange - tsart>tend");
603  }
604 
605  bool ans = true;
606 
607  if (tstart < t1) {
608  tstart = t1;
609  ans = false;
610  }
611 
612  if (tend > t2) {
613  tend = t2;
614  ans = false;
615  }
616 
617  unsigned int ch = src.GetChannels();
618  unsigned int i1 = src.GetIndex(t1);
619  unsigned int i2 = src.GetIndex(t2);
620 
621  ddst->resize(dsrc->size1(), i2 - i1 + 1);
622 
623  double scale = dst.GetScale();
624 
625  for (unsigned int c = 0; c < ch; c++) {
626  for (unsigned int i = i1; i <= i2; i++) {
627 
628  (*ddst)(c, i - i1) = scale * (*dsrc)(c, i);
629 
630  }
631  }
632 
633  dst.SetScale(1.0);
634  dst.SetStart(t1);
635  dst.SetSampling(src.GetSampling());
636 
637  return ans;
638  }
639 
640  void ViewUtil::Fill(SeqViewDouble& ts, double value) {
641  Dmatrix* data = ts.GetData();
642  unsigned int s1 = data->size1();
643  unsigned int s2 = data->size2();
644 
645  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
646  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
647  (*data)(i, j) = value;
648  }
649  }
650  ts.SetScale(1.0);
651  }

653  void ViewUtil::FillSeq(SeqViewDouble& ts, unsigned int i, unsigned int j, double value) {
654  Dmatrix* data = ts.GetData();
655  unsigned int s1 = data->size1();
656  unsigned int s2 = data->size2();
657 
658 
659  (*data)(i, j) = value;
660 
661  ts.SetScale(1.0);
662  }

664  void ViewUtil::Apply(double (*func)(double), SeqViewDouble& ts) {
665  Dmatrix* data = ts.GetData();
666  unsigned int s1 = data->size1();
667  unsigned int s2 = data->size2();
668 
669  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
670  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
671  (*data)(i, j) = func((*data)(i, j));
672  }
673  }
674  }
675 
676  void ViewUtil::Apply(double (*func)(double), SeqViewDouble& ts, SeqViewDouble& res) {
677  Dmatrix* data = ts.GetData();
678  Dmatrix* rs = res.GetData();
679  unsigned int s1 = data->size1();
680  unsigned int s2 = data->size2();
681  rs->resize(s1, s2);
682  res.SetStart(ts.GetStart());
683  res.SetSampling(ts.GetSampling());
684  res.SetScale(ts.GetScale());
685 
686  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
687  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
688  (*rs)(i, j) = func((*data)(i, j));
689  }
690  }
691  }
692 
693  void ViewUtil::AffineTransformation(SeqViewDouble& ts, double a, double b, SeqViewDouble& res) {
694  Dmatrix* data = ts.GetData();
695  Dmatrix* rs = res.GetData();
696  unsigned int s1 = data->size1();
697  unsigned int s2 = data->size2();
698  rs->resize(s1, s2);
699  res.SetStart(ts.GetStart());
700  res.SetSampling(ts.GetSampling());
701  res.SetScale(ts.GetScale());
702 
703  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
704  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
705  (*rs)(i, j) = a * (*data)(i, j) + b;
706  }
707  }
708  }
709 
710  void ViewUtil::BinOp(std::complex<double> (*func)(std::complex<double>, std::complex<double>), SeqViewComplex& ts1, SeqViewComplex& ts2, SeqViewComplex& res) {
711  Cmatrix* data1 = ts1.GetData();
712  Cmatrix* data2 = ts2.GetData();
713  Cmatrix* rs = res.GetData();
714  unsigned int s1 = data1->size1();
715  unsigned int s2 = data2->size2();
716  if ((data2->size1() != s1) || (data2->size2() != s2)) {
717  LogSevere("Wrong size for input views");
718  throw std::runtime_error("Util::BinOp");
719  }
720  rs->resize(s1, s2);
721  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
722  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
723  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale());
724 
725  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
726  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
727  (*rs)(i, j) = func((*data1)(i, j), (*data2)(i, j));
728  }
729  }
730  }
731 
732  void ViewUtil::BinOp(double (*func)(double, double), SeqViewDouble& ts1, SeqViewDouble& ts2, SeqViewDouble& res) {
733  Dmatrix* data1 = ts1.GetData();
734  Dmatrix* data2 = ts2.GetData();
735  Dmatrix* rs = res.GetData();
736  unsigned int s1 = data1->size1();
737  unsigned int s2 = data2->size2();
738  if ((data2->size1() != s1) || (data2->size2() != s2)) {
739  LogSevere("Wrong size for input views");
740  throw std::runtime_error("Util::BinOp");
741  }
742  rs->resize(s1, s2);
743  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
744  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
745  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale());
746 
747  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
748  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
749  (*rs)(i, j) = func((*data1)(i, j), (*data2)(i, j));
750  }
751  }
752  }
753 
754  void ViewUtil::Apply(std::complex<double> (*func)(std::complex<double>), SeqViewComplex& fs) {
755  Cmatrix* data = fs.GetData();
756  unsigned int s1 = data->size1();
757  unsigned int s2 = data->size2();
758 
759  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
760  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
761  (*data)(i, j) = func((*data)(i, j));
762  }
763  }
764  }
765 
766  void ViewUtil::ComplexToPolar(SeqViewComplex& ts1, SeqViewDouble& ts2) {
767  Cmatrix* dataIn = ts1.GetData();
768  unsigned int s1In = dataIn->size1();
769  unsigned int s2In = dataIn->size2();
770 
771  Dmatrix* dataOut = ts2.GetData();
772  unsigned int s1Out = dataOut->size1();
773  unsigned int s2Out = dataOut->size2();
774 
775  if ((2 * s1In != s1Out) || (s2In != s2Out)) {
776  LogWarning("Util::Complex : Resizing output view");
777  dataOut->resize(2 * s1In, s2In);
778  }
779 
780  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1In; i++) {
781  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2In; j++) {
782  (*dataOut)(i * 2, j) = abs((*dataIn)(i, j));
783  (*dataOut)(i * 2 + 1, j) = arg((*dataIn)(i, j));
784  }
785  }
786  ts2.SetScale(ts1.GetScale());
787  ts2.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
788  ts2.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
789 
790  }
791 
792  void ViewUtil::Apply(std::complex<double> (*func)(std::complex<double>), SeqViewComplex& fs, SeqViewComplex& res) {
793  Cmatrix* data = fs.GetData();
794  Cmatrix* rs = res.GetData();
795  unsigned int s1 = data->size1();
796  unsigned int s2 = data->size2();
797  rs->resize(s1, s2);
798  res.SetStart(fs.GetStart());
799  res.SetSampling(fs.GetSampling());
800  res.SetScale(fs.GetScale());
801 
802  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
803  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
804  (*rs)(i, j) = abs((*data)(i, j));
805  }
806  }
807  }
808 
809  void ViewUtil::Sum(SeqViewDouble& res, double scale, SeqViewDouble& ts) {
810  Dmatrix* data = ts.GetData();
811  Dmatrix* rs = res.GetData();
812  unsigned int s1 = data->size1();
813  unsigned int s2 = data->size2();
814  rs->resize(s1, s2);
815  res.SetStart(ts.GetStart());
816  res.SetSampling(ts.GetSampling());
817  res.SetScale(ts.GetScale());
818 
819  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
820  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
821  (*rs)(i, j) = (*rs)(i, j) + scale * (*data)(i, j);
822  }
823  }
824  }
825 
826  void ViewUtil::Sum(SeqViewComplex& res, double scale, SeqViewComplex& ts) {
827  Cmatrix* data = ts.GetData();
828  Cmatrix* rs = res.GetData();
829  unsigned int s1 = data->size1();
830  unsigned int s2 = data->size2();
831  rs->resize(s1, s2);
832  res.SetStart(ts.GetStart());
833  res.SetSampling(ts.GetSampling());
834  res.SetScale(ts.GetScale());
835 
836  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
837  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
838  (*rs)(i, j) = (*rs)(i, j) + scale * (*data)(i, j);
839  }
840  }
841  }
842 
843  void ViewUtil::Inverse(SeqViewDouble& ts1, SeqViewDouble& res) {
844  Dmatrix* data1 = ts1.GetData();
845  Dmatrix* rs = res.GetData();
846  unsigned int s1 = data1->size1();
847  unsigned int s2 = data1->size2();
848 
849  rs->resize(s1, s2);
850  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
851  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
852  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale());
853 
854 
855  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
856  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
857  (*rs)(i, j) = 1.0 / (*data1)(i, j);
858  }
859  }
860  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale());
861  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
862  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
863  }
864 
865  void ViewUtil::Ratio(SeqViewDouble& ts1, SeqViewDouble& ts2, SeqViewDouble& res) {
866  Dmatrix* data1 = ts1.GetData();
867  Dmatrix* data2 = ts2.GetData();
868  Dmatrix* rs = res.GetData();
869  unsigned int s1 = data1->size1();
870 
871  if ((data2->size1() != s1)) {
872  LogSevere("Wrong size for input views");
873  throw std::runtime_error("Util::BinOp");
874  }
875 
876  unsigned int s2 = (data1->size2() > data2->size2()) ? data2->size2() : data1->size2();
877 
878  rs->resize(s1, s2);
879  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
880  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
881  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale());
882 
883 
884  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
885  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
886  (*rs)(i, j) = (*data1)(i, j) / (*data2)(i, j);
887  }
888  }
889 
890  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale() / ts2.GetScale());
891  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
892  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
893 
894  }
895 
896  void ViewUtil::Ratio(SeqViewComplex& ts1, SeqViewComplex& ts2, SeqViewComplex& res) {
897  Cmatrix* data1 = ts1.GetData();
898  Cmatrix* data2 = ts2.GetData();
899  Cmatrix* rs = res.GetData();
900  unsigned int s1 = data1->size1();
901 
902  if ((data2->size1() != s1)) {
903  LogSevere("Wrong size for input views");
904  throw std::runtime_error("Util::BinOp");
905  }
906 
907  unsigned int s2 = (data1->size2() > data2->size2()) ? data2->size2() : data1->size2();
908 
909  rs->resize(s1, s2);
910  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
911  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
912  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale());
913 
914 
915  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
916  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
917  (*rs)(i, j) = (*data1)(i, j) / (*data2)(i, j);
918  }
919  }
920 
921  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale() / ts2.GetScale());
922  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
923  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
924 
925  }

939 
940  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
941  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {

943  }
944  }

958  unsigned int s2 = data1->size2();
959 
960  rs->resize(s1, s2);
961  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
962  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
963  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale());
964 
965 
966  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
967  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
968  (*rs)(i, j) = abs((*data1)(i, j));
969  }
970  }
971 
972  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale());
973  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
974  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());

978 
979  void ViewUtil::Abs2(SeqViewComplex& ts1, SeqViewDouble& res) {
980 
981  Cmatrix* data1 = ts1.GetData();
982  Dmatrix* rs = res.GetData();
983  unsigned int s1 = data1->size1();
984  unsigned int s2 = data1->size2();
985 
986  rs->resize(s1, s2);
987  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
988  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
989  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale());
990 
991 
992  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
993  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
994  (*rs)(i, j) = (*data1)(i, j).real()*(*data1)(i, j).real()+(*data1)(i, j).imag()*(*data1)(i, j).imag();
995  }
996  }
997 
998  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale());
999  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
1000  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
1001 
1002 
1003  }
1004 
1005  void ViewUtil::Prod(SeqViewDouble& ts1, SeqViewDouble& ts2, SeqViewDouble& res) {
1006 
1007  Dmatrix* data1 = ts1.GetData();
1008  Dmatrix* data2 = ts2.GetData();
1009  Dmatrix* rs = res.GetData();
1010  unsigned int s1 = data1->size1();
1011 
1012  if ((data2->size1() != s1)) {
1013  LogSevere("Wrong size for input views");
1014  throw std::runtime_error("Util::BinOp");
1015  }
1016 
1017  unsigned int s2 = (data1->size2() > data2->size2()) ? data2->size2() : data1->size2();
1018 
1019  rs->resize(s1, s2);
1020  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
1021  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
1022  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale());
1023 
1024 
1025  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
1026  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
1027  (*rs)(i, j) = (*data1)(i, j)*(*data2)(i, j);
1028  }
1029  }
1030 
1031  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale() * ts2.GetScale());
1032  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
1033  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
1034 
1035 
1036  }
1037 
1038  void ViewUtil::Prod(SeqViewDouble& ts1, SeqViewComplex& ts2, SeqViewComplex& res) {
1039 
1040  Dmatrix* data1 = ts1.GetData();
1041  Cmatrix* data2 = ts2.GetData();
1042  Cmatrix* rs = res.GetData();
1043  unsigned int s1 = data1->size1();
1044 
1045  if ((data2->size1() != s1)) {
1046  LogSevere("Wrong size for input views");
1047  throw std::runtime_error("Util::Prod");
1048  }
1049 
1050  unsigned int s2 = (data1->size2() > data2->size2()) ? data2->size2() : data1->size2();
1051 
1052  rs->resize(s1, s2);
1053  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
1054  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
1055  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale());
1056 
1057 
1058  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
1059  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
1060  (*rs)(i, j) = (*data1)(i, j)*(*data2)(i, j);
1061  }
1062  }
1063 
1064  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale() * ts2.GetScale());
1065  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
1066  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
1067 
1068  }
1069 
1070  void ViewUtil::Phase(SeqViewComplex& ts1, SeqViewComplex& ts2, SeqViewComplex& res) {
1071 
1072  Cmatrix* data1 = ts1.GetData();
1073  Cmatrix* data2 = ts2.GetData();
1074  Cmatrix* rs = res.GetData();
1075 
1076  unsigned int sa = data1->size1();
1077  unsigned int sb = data2->size1();
1078  unsigned int s1res = sa*sb;
1079  unsigned int s2res = (data1->size2() < data2->size2()) ? data1->size2() : data2->size2();
1080 
1081  if ((rs->size1() != s1res) || (rs->size2() != s2res)) {
1082  LogWarning("Resizing output view");
1083  rs->resize(s1res, s2res);
1084  }
1085 
1086  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
1087  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
1088  res.SetScale(1.0);
1089 
1090 
1091  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < sa; i++) {
1092  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < sb; j++) {
1093  for (unsigned k = 0; k < s2res; k++) {
1094  tsa::Cdouble a = (*data1)(i, k);
1095  tsa::Cdouble b = (*data2)(j, k);
1096  (*rs)(i * sb + j, k) = conj(a) * b / sqrt((a.real() * a.real() + a.imag() * a.imag())*(b.real() * b.real() + b.imag() * b.imag()));
1097  }
1098  }
1099  }
1100  }
1101 
1102  void ViewUtil::ProdConj(SeqViewComplex& ts1, SeqViewComplex& ts2, SeqViewComplex& res) {
1103 
1104  Cmatrix* data1 = ts1.GetData();
1105  Cmatrix* data2 = ts2.GetData();
1106  Cmatrix* rs = res.GetData();
1107  unsigned int s1 = data1->size1();
1108 
1109  if (((unsigned int) data2->size1() != s1)) {
1110  fprintf(stderr, "%d %d\n", data1->size1(), data2->size1());
1111  LogSevere("Wrong size for input views");
1112  throw std::runtime_error("Util::ProdConj");
1113  }
1114 
1115  unsigned int s2 = (data1->size2() > data2->size2()) ? data2->size2() : data1->size2();
1116 
1117  rs->resize(s1, s2);
1118  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
1119  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
1120  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale());
1121 
1122 
1123  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
1124  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
1125  (*rs)(i, j) = (*data1)(i, j) * conj((*data2)(i, j));
1126  }
1127  }
1128 
1129  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale() * ts2.GetScale());
1130  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
1131  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
1132 
1133 
1134  }
1135 
1136  void ViewUtil::Ratio(SeqViewDouble& ts1, SeqViewComplex& ts2, SeqViewComplex& res) {
1137  Dmatrix* data1 = ts1.GetData();
1138  Cmatrix* data2 = ts2.GetData();
1139  Cmatrix* rs = res.GetData();
1140  unsigned int s1 = data1->size1();
1141 
1142  if ((data2->size1() != s1)) {
1143  LogSevere("Wrong size for input views");
1144  throw std::runtime_error("Util::BinOp");
1145  }
1146 
1147  unsigned int s2 = (data1->size2() > data2->size2()) ? data2->size2() : data1->size2();
1148 
1149  rs->resize(s1, s2);
1150  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
1151  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
1152  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale());
1153 
1154 
1155  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
1156  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
1157  (*rs)(i, j) = (*data1)(i, j) / (*data2)(i, j);
1158  }
1159  }
1160 
1161  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale() / ts2.GetScale());
1162  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
1163  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
1164 
1165  }
1166 
1167  void ViewUtil::BlockSum(SeqViewComplex& in, SeqViewComplex& out, int bsize) {
1168  Cmatrix* data1 = in.GetData();
1169  Cmatrix* data2 = out.GetData();
1170  unsigned int s1 = data1->size1();
1171  unsigned int s2 = data1->size2();
1172 
1173  s2 = s2 / bsize;
1174 
1175  if ((data2->size1() != s1) || (data2->size2() != s2)) {
1176  data2->resize(s1, s2);
1177  }
1178  out.SetStart(in.GetStart());
1179  out.SetSampling(in.GetSampling() * bsize);
1180  out.SetScale(in.GetScale());
1181 
1182  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
1183  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
1184  (*data2)(i, j) = (*data1)(i, bsize * j);
1185  for (unsigned int k = 1; k < bsize; k++) {
1186  (*data2)(i, j) += (*data1)(i, bsize * j + k);
1187  }
1188  }
1189  }
1190  }
1191 
1192  void ViewUtil::Ratio(SeqViewComplex& ts1, SeqViewDouble& ts2, SeqViewComplex& res) {
1193  Cmatrix* data1 = ts1.GetData();
1194  Dmatrix* data2 = ts2.GetData();
1195  Cmatrix* rs = res.GetData();
1196  unsigned int s1 = data1->size1();
1197 
1198  if ((data2->size1() != s1)) {
1199  LogSevere("Wrong size for input views");
1200  throw std::runtime_error("Util::BinOp");
1201  }
1202 
1203  unsigned int s2 = (data1->size2() > data2->size2()) ? data2->size2() : data1->size2();
1204 
1205  rs->resize(s1, s2);
1206  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
1207  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
1208  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale());
1209 
1210 
1211  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
1212  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
1213  (*rs)(i, j) = (*data1)(i, j) / (*data2)(i, j);
1214  }
1215  }
1216 
1217  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale() / ts2.GetScale());
1218  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
1219  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
1220 
1221  }
1222 
1223  void ViewUtil::Multiply(SeqViewDouble& ts1, SeqViewDouble& ts2, SeqViewDouble& res) {
1224  Dmatrix* data1 = ts1.GetData();
1225  Dmatrix* data2 = ts2.GetData();
1226  Dmatrix* rs = res.GetData();
1227  unsigned int s1 = data1->size1();
1228  unsigned int s2 = data1->size2();
1229 
1230  if ((data2->size1() != s1) || (data2->size2() != s2)) {
1231  LogSevere("Wrong size for input views");
1232  throw std::runtime_error("Util::Multiply");
1233  }
1234 
1235  rs->resize(s1, s2);
1236  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
1237  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
1238  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale() * ts2.GetScale());
1239 
1240  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
1241  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
1242  (*rs)(i, j) = (*data1)(i, j)*(*data2)(i, j);
1243  }
1244  }
1245 
1246 
1247 
1248  }
1249 
1250  void ViewUtil::Multiply(SeqViewDouble& ts1, SeqViewComplex& ts2, SeqViewComplex& res) {
1251  Dmatrix* data1 = ts1.GetData();
1252  Cmatrix* data2 = ts2.GetData();
1253  Cmatrix* rs = res.GetData();
1254  unsigned int s1 = data1->size1();
1255  unsigned int s2 = data1->size2();
1256 
1257  if ((data2->size1() != s1) || (data2->size2() != s2)) {
1258  LogSevere("Wrong size for input views");
1259  throw std::runtime_error("Util::Multiply");
1260  }
1261 
1262  rs->resize(s1, s2);
1263  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
1264  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
1265  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale() * ts2.GetScale());
1266 
1267  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
1268  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
1269  (*rs)(i, j) = (*data1)(i, j)*(*data2)(i, j);
1270  }
1271  }
1272  }
1273 
1274  void ViewUtil::Multiply(SeqViewComplex& ts1, SeqViewComplex& ts2, SeqViewComplex& res) {
1275  Cmatrix* data1 = ts1.GetData();
1276  Cmatrix* data2 = ts2.GetData();
1277  Cmatrix* rs = res.GetData();
1278  unsigned int s1 = data1->size1();
1279  unsigned int s2 = data1->size2();
1280 
1281  if ((data2->size1() != s1) || (data2->size2() != s2)) {
1282  LogSevere("Wrong size for input views");
1283  throw std::runtime_error("Util::Multiply");
1284  }
1285 
1286  rs->resize(s1, s2);
1287  res.SetStart(ts1.GetStart());
1288  res.SetSampling(ts1.GetSampling());
1289  res.SetScale(ts1.GetScale() * ts2.GetScale());
1290 
1291  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s1; i++) {
1292  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < s2; j++) {
1293  (*rs)(i, j) = (*data1)(i, j)*(*data2)(i, j);
1294  }
1295  }
1296  }
1297 
1298 
1299 }
